data.title: 1.42 viewers saw Rahul Mahajan tie the knot
data.meta_description: Afaqs: Rahul Mahajan may have not been a popular name before, but his wedding on air surely got audiences glued to the television sets. The finale of Rahul Dulhaniya Le Jayega, roped in 1.42 viewers as per aMap.
data.text:
Afaqs: Rahul Mahajan may have not been a popular name before, but his wedding on air surely got audiences glued to the television sets. The finale of Rahul Dulhaniya Le Jayega, roped in 1.42 viewers as per aMap.

The grand episode that went on for 3 hours and 15 minutes recorded an average TVR of 4. Rahul Dulhaniya Le Jayega was one of popular shows on air giving a tough time to daily soaps.

The last season of Raki ka Swayamvar was a disappointment for the Imagine viewers with the wedding not taking place. However the channel did kept on saying through promotions that this time it will be different.

According to Atrayee Chakraborty director, planning sciences, Lintas Media Group, “”The reality element of the show has diminished and viewers are clearly watching it because of the ‘masala’ factor.”

The show was aired twice catering to both metro and smaller town audience. The 8 pm and 11 pm slot helped in rope numerous viewers for Rahul Dulhaniya Le Jayega.
